response.overview: The "BABYMETAL World Tour 2014 Apocalypse" highlights captured the electrifying essence of the band's first global tour, which was a significant milestone in spreading their unique blend of J-pop and heavy metal worldwide. Throughout 2014, BABYMETAL performed in various international venues, bringing their dynamic live shows to ecstatic fans across Europe, North America, and Asia. The tour highlights featured powerhouse performances of hits like "Ijime, Dame, Zettai" and "Headbangeeeeerrrrr!!!!!", showcasing their signature choreography and the intense backing of the Kami Band. Each stop displayed the band's growing confidence and the global embrace of their innovative music style, culminating in a tour that not only expanded their fan base but also solidified their place in the international music scene.
response.title: BABYMETAL - World Tour 2014 Apocalypse - Highlights
